chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Karldin Manfor, p. 84 (87)—Asha'man who accompanied Loial to all the stedding and former Ogier groves to seal the Waygates there or warn others to monitor them. Like Flinn and Narishma, he is on the Deserter's List, as is every Asha'man that works with Rand. See also Ledar; Loial; Underhill.
